title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". This results in the build menu option still appearing in the Java popup menus. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user has selected the option to perform build automatically on resource modification in the Preferences > Workbench settings.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when the user has not selected the option to perform build automatically on resource modification in the Preferences > Workbench settings.
SR:
1. Go to the Java perspective.
2. Open the context sensitive popup menu.
3. Verify that the "Build" action is always enabled, regardless of the preference settings.
